briefTitle: Safety and Immunogenicity of 20vPnC in Toddlers With 2 Prior Doses of Prevenar 13
officialTitle: A PHASE 3, RANDOMIZED, PARTIALLY DOUBLE-BLIND TRIAL TO EVALUATE THE SAFETY AND IMMUNOGENICITY OF 20-VALENT PNEUMOCOCCAL CONJUGATE VACCINE IN HEALTHY TODDLERS 12 THROUGH 23 MONTHS OF AGE WITH 2 PRIOR INFANT DOSES OF PREVENAR 13

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Local Reactions Within 7 Days After Last Vaccination
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Within 7 days after last vaccination (for reporting arm 2-Dose 20vPnC last vaccination was Dose 2 and for 1-dose 20vPnC and 13vPnC Control it was Dose 1)
